TEXT.TITLE: COCA-COLA BOTTLING <COKE> TERMINATES TALKS
TEXT.BODY: Coca-Cola Bottling Co Consolidated said it terminated negotiations with the proposed purchaser of its wholly owned subsidiary headquartered in Vancouver, B.C. The company said it is vigorously continuing its efforts to sell its Canadian operations, substantially on the terms and conditions previously announced. Reuter
